/usr/bin/c++  -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/fieldconv.dir/fieldconv.cpp.o CMakeFiles/fieldconv.dir/__/C/mystring.c.o CMakeFiles/fieldconv.dir/__/C/NDnetwork.c.o CMakeFiles/fieldconv.dir/__/C/NDfield.c.o CMakeFiles/fieldconv.dir/__/C/NDfield_VTK_IO.c.o CMakeFiles/fieldconv.dir/__/C/myendian.c.o CMakeFiles/fieldconv.dir/sortID.cpp.o CMakeFiles/fieldconv.dir/__/C/distances.c.o CMakeFiles/fieldconv.dir/__/C/asciiSurvey.c.o CMakeFiles/fieldconv.dir/__/C/simplex.c.o  -o fieldconv  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib: -lpthread -L/usr/local/lib -lgsl -lgslcblas -lm -L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu -lSDL -lSDL_image /usr/local/lib/libcfitsio.so -lm -lnsl -fopenmp
